This is R script that reproduces [ShangtongZhang's Python code](https://github.com/ShangtongZhang/reinforcement-learning-an-introduction/blob/master/chapter01/tic_tac_toe.py) for Sutton & Barto's book Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction [@sutton2018reinforcement]
